mapper.insert: insert into bop_admin_method (method, type, service_invocation, group_name, description, tax_property_name, passed_headers, request_name, response_name,request_host, context_path, doc_url, status, creator, auditor, audit_time) values(#{method}, #{type}, #{serviceInvocation}, #{groupName}, #{description}, #{taxPropertyName}, #{passedHeaders}, #{requestName}, #{responseName}, #{requestHost}, #{contextPath}, #{docUrl}, #{status}, #{creator}, #{auditor}, #{auditTime})
mapper.select: select * from bop_admin_method bam where bam.method_id = #{methodId} and deleted = 0;
select * from bop_admin_method bam where bam.method = #{method} and deleted = 0;
mapper.update: update bop_admin_method bam set bam.deleted = 1 where bam.method_id = #{methodId};
